name: cart_bug_fix
spec:
We have a bug in our shopping cart. When a user opens the "Preview" modal and adds an item to see the shipping cost, that item gets added to their *actual* cart because we passed the cart object by reference. 

Fix the `preview_item(cart, item)` function so it calculates the new total *without* modifying the original cart object.

expected.focus: Does the solution create a copy of the cart or use a new array/object?

name: default_config_danger
spec:
Our `initialize_widget(config = {})` function sets `config.isEnabled = true`. 

A developer called this function with a shared constant `DEFAULT_OPTS`. Now, every other widget on the page is accidentally enabled because the shared object was modified.

rewrite the initialization logic to prevent this side effect.

expected.focus: Does the solution treated the input object as read-only?
